Intro: Welcome Cu Chulainn to Waesfjord this is where we live, in this small settlement of the Coast of Eire
Eire is a strange place with stones that can magically teleport us to across the shore back and foward....
We settled near some native Irish people, they are very kind haha..
As our numbers grew we needed to build more outposts to expand our presence in Eire...
This is the seconded way point but when there is Pollution near by they dont work....
We have..... had 2 outposts so we built a bridge to get over to them big trees  other trees but we ran into a bit of a problem there were Wessex Soldiers waiting for us to complete the bridge......

As we grew in numbers the Wessex Kingdom in England noticed we moved here so they sent their soldiers to get rid of us and pollute our land with RUBBER and PLASTIC, they hired Benandonner the scottish giant to help them remove us in search of Fionn McCool
As we speak they are attacking and polluting our WAYPOINNTS and our VILLAGES we need you Cu Chulainn to fight them back to England and save our land
